dialogues.speaker: 1A
dialogues.text: A glowing blue box like a large toaster (the Time Cube) s in a sterile lab shelf, plugged in. A rubber duck sits on cluttered desk. GARY PINBACK (40) identified by "Gary" stitched on a white lab coat - enters frame, unplugs the and shoves it in a duffle bag nervously (his face framed of this entire montage). An ALARM SOUNDS. RED SIREN LIGHT splashes into frame. Opening credits play on walls and ot surfaces of this montage before and after Gary runs throu frames. Gary goes to a desk and rushes to steal stationary, stapl pencils, a calculator etc; he sweeps the desk surface jun with his arm into the duffle bag on top of the Time Cube. picks up the rubber duck and shoves it in his pocket.

dialogues.speaker: 1B
dialogues.text: A white lab coat fills the frame then reveals Gary runnin away. Gary's feet running. Duffle bag in frame. HIGH ANGLE: long hall, following Gary running. ANGLE ON DOOR: it's marked SPACEPORT LEVEL 4, Gary slams it and runs through. LOW ANGLE: Gary runs through long high ceiling hall away camera. Red Siren light spins on the wall. Gary goes thro the far door. Gary slips and wipes out, spilling his stationary. He gra his time cube bag and duck and keeps running.

dialogues.speaker: 1C
dialogues.text: MEDIUM CLOSE: Gary throws the bag into a hatch and climbs after it, closes the hatch, spins the handle from the ins It's marked with decals reading CARGO DRONE 9. A blast door lowers into frame covering the drone and we SPACE SHUTTLE TAKING OFF SOUNDS.

dialogues.speaker: 1D
dialogues.text: A few space stations, shuttles and satellites fly around. sparse ring of garbage circles the looming earth. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   2. Cargo Drone 9 - small space shuttle cruises away from Ear with matching hatch and markings from scene 1C on rear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unauthorized shuttle, return to Antarctica Research Station immediately! This is your final warning!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, blast it. LASER BLASTS originating from Earth narrowly miss the shuttle. A FLASH OF LIGHT - the shuttle is gone without a trace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did it go? Did you get it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not reading anything. Must have totally vaporized it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice shot. Elevator music plays O.S. We float back to reveal the WAS 8518 REGINA STATION in orbit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 2 JIMMY ANDERSON (25) wears a jumpsuit with utility belt, h small rolling suitcase, and a bunch of papers in the othe hand. Elevator music. He stands waiting in a small indust looking passage with heavy duty inner and outer doors. A light. He's sweating, pale. He presses the button repeate

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have any fruits, vegetables, or other food products?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fever, stuffy nose, cold symptoms?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Jimmy sneezes. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   3.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allergies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you worked on the WENDI series computer systems before?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You still have a WENDI? The light turns green and the inner door opens, Jimmy ent the space station airlock module. A sign above the airlock says: "REMEMBER ALL ACCIDENTS IN SPACE ARE SERIOUS ACCIDENTS". Jimmy sneezes again, wipes nose, offers his hand to shake. He reads Anton's name tag

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain Balvenie?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call me Anton. ANTON BALVENIE (35) snatches the documents, and walks awa he reads. Jimmy follows him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're very informal around here.

dialogues.speaker: 2A
dialogues.text: Jimmy follows Anton in a walk `N Talk. The walls have yel blast shields over the windows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy Anderson, United Spaceworkers Orbital 108 since 2147, allergic to pollen. Certified level... nine rating?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Engineer level nine rating. Anton is unimpressed. Jimmy stops to poke a panel with a loose wire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Level 9 engineers aren't rated for central systems repair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, they are. I am. Do you want me to go back? Anton corners Jimmy. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   4.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got you up here, I'll put you to work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great. This is my first orbital assignment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me clue you in. Up here the work never stops. There's always orbital debris piling up and someone has to be in each sector with a line of sight on it to keep launch vectors clear. Do you follow me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No problem chief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not a chief I'm a Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, Captain. They keep walking, reaching the junction at the end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just make sure you finish by zero eight hundred Zulu. I'm not signing overtime forms. Do you know how to fix mess hall food dispensers?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Maybe. What's the matter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All it's giving is sandwiches. That's your next job after the mainframe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 4 Computer monitors with important data cover the walls, th are six stations with rotating chairs and an island of consoles in the middle. Flight Specialist TILDA GENERO (2 has her feet up, headphones on. The door opens and Jimmy follows Anton into the control room. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The terminal on the fritz is over there. Jimmy sees Tilda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's Lieutenant Tilda Genero. You don't need to talk to her. Tilda glances at him and turns her chair away from him. Jimmy drags his suitcase, hitting everything, and dumps o electronic junk near the terminal. He opens up a panel ne screen showing static.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's your problem. Jimmy digs around in the panel with wires sticking out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the sonovac coffee machine is malfunctioning. Can you fix that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. I might have to take the mainframe offline to fix this-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever, get it done. Anton goes to another terminal and uses the computer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's his problem? Tilda ignores him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said, what's his problem? ... I guess you can't hear me with your headphones on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can hear you.

dialogues.speaker: OMITTED
dialogues.text: 5 Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   6

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 6 In big naval ship name letters it says "WASS-8518 REGINA" the dirty run-down and decaying sanitation station. FLASH OF LIGHT: The cargo shuttle appears out of nowhere, flying away from the Earth as it was before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 7 Tilda has her feet up, she listens to the radio chatter, caring in the least. She presses a few buttons. Jimmy tes circuits in the background. She adjusts her headphones. Computer monitors show generic scrolling text, radar swee and simple iconographic status displays in the background

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Orbital control, this is ground control, come in please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's shaking Steve?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh hey Bill. Was Antarctica station looking for a missing shuttle earlier today?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roger that. Did you find it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thing is I have an unregistered shuttle here tagged with a high probability of debris collision. No life signs on board. Think it's the same one?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Negative ground control. The one Antarctica lost had a passenger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 8 The small drone appears moving (relatively) slowly toward general area of the Regina station. A METAL SCREW floats in space (shallow focus). The drone coming toward the screw from the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take a look at the collision warning. I read station eight five one eight in your sector.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   6A

dialogues.speaker: GROUND CONTROL, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Sanitation Station Regina. Better get them on it. Are you going to come to poker night? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -     11/12/11

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know it Steve. See you next Wednesday.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 9 Tilda lazily leans over and presses the button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sanitation station eight five-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Station Regina here. I've been monitoring. We're not reading debris in our sector.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you check again. Tilda is annoyed and hits some buttons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's probably a sensor glitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a negative, the debris appears to be between class 2 and class 3. Can you whack it with a proton beam?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ground control, it's too big for a proton beam if it's class 3. You know that. Anton comes over to Tilda and looks at the monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do they want now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A cargo drone is coming through. They've got a collision alarm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks too small for a laser sweep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Probably just a false alarm. What do you want me to tell them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you want me to take a look at the sensors? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   8.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Keep working. Anton hits some keys, then presses the radio button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Captain Balvenie of sanitation station eight five one eight. Who the hell is telling my operations officer how to do her job?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Balvenie-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to send someone else. Our main computer is down for service.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on... Now I've got Antarctica station telling me it's a priority one situation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not our problem. The book says it's too small for lasers. Check your book down there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about a particle beam?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Valentina? Why am I dealing with these guys? It's her shift.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 10 An intercom on the wall next to a bunch of bubbles. VALEN NOVAK (33) takes a bubble bath in a water tank, with a ru duck. A towel is hung on equipment nearby. Anton sounds l he puts the mic too close to his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valentina to the control room immediately please. Valentina to the control room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about you just take a pod out there and pick up the debris? She turns to listen to the voices on the intercom. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   9

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't take pods out for class two debris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 11 Continuous. Anton practically eats a headset microphone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sanitation Station Regina out. Anton switches off the radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did he just tell us to take a pod to look for a class 2 object? Jimmy hangs out next to Tilda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know where can I get lunch?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mess hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you show me the way?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, you'd like lunch? Know what I'd like? I'd like my computer fixed right now. Fix it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ok Anton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's Captain Balvenie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 12 The cargo drone ship cruises along. It's approaching the metal screw floating in space. SMASH - the drone hits the screw and EXPLODES. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 13 Red lights and indicators flash. A siren sounds. Tilda an Anton leap into action at the controls. Jimmy comes over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that? Is everything ok?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Collision detected. Secondary explosion. Reading a level six debris field out there. Lots of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are there any salvage crews in the sector?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope. But they're scrambling two teams. They must really want the pod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think there's something good in there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my bet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well I'm calling it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened? Is that the collision alarm?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Match orbit and position for pod launch. Run the checklist. Valentina report to airlock two. We're going fishing. Anton runs out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 14 The siren sounds over the intercom. Valentina towels off. zips up her jumpsuit and runs out.

dialogues.speaker: 14A
dialogues.text: Jimmy comes over to Tilda again. She turns off the sirens Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you get down to Earth much? Tilda turns around from her terminal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need to monitor the salvage operation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you always share a salvage bonus with the entire crew?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three way split.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we're four including me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You didn't sign in. You're not crew. Tilda puts on her headphones and turns away from Jimmy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's the sign-in sheet? Tilda points at her headphones without turning to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll sign in later I guess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 16 Anton heroically puts on a space suit and gear. Valentina comes in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are we saying three way split on salvage?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not cutting in the new guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the good space suit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got here first. And you handle the heat better. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -     11/12/11

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forget it then. Anton takes off his space-pants and hands them to Valenti

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine, fine. There's nothing wrong with the other suit anyway. I don't care.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just took a bath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said fine. Anton takes the other suit. It's very smelly. He takes of his shirt and pants and they both dress in space suits. [Simple montage of zipping, buckling, boots, gloves.]

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 17 A grungy old salvage pod moves away from the Regina and thrusts off into space toward a burning debris cloud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 18 Valentina and Anton are squashed up next to each other at controls of the small pod, helmets on laps, wearing heads

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are we bothering with this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This could be the haul we've been waiting for. They're flipping out over this cargo drone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. It must be worth something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If there's a big salvage bonus, I want to go somewhere with a beach. Looks like something over there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ya I see it. Line us up. They work the controls. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -     11/12/11

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sanitation Pod, do not approach the debris field. The area will be salvaged by an authorized crew. Repeat; do not approach the cargo drone debris field, this now is a secure sector.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ground control, this is our sector and we need to keep this space clear. We got all kinds of transports coming through today.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Negative. Stand down- Anton turns off the radio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They really want whatever was on that shuttle. It's going to be good. Anton pulls out sandwiches from a pouch with difficulty a eats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you bring one for me? Anton hands her a sandwich.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Veggie? Have you got ham?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got the good space suit. Valentina looks at him, stops steering the pod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine. God damn it. Take the ham. He gives her the ham sandwich. They eat and fly the pod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 19 The pod scoots through a cloud of junk and boxes floating spinning in space.

dialogues.speaker: OMITTED
dialogues.text: 20 Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   14

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 21 Anton and Valentina flip switches and use joysticks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Almost full. Lets dump this load and try for another pass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got it. Closing the hatch. Hatch secure. Looks like there may be an active energy source in there. A clunk noise. Anton checks his watch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's fine. Skip the safety check, we've got two minutes left. Once it's onboard, it's ours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 24 The room has salvage bins, heavy machinery, gamma ray detectors, piles of cables and garbage everywhere. Large pieces of burned space junk dump into the room through a hatch. Gary's Time Cube falls in. It glows ominous blue. starts to HUMM. A FLASH OF LIGHT ripples out of the box!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 25 Anton pulls up a handle like a parking brake. The sounds hydraulic pistons O.S. Outside the window there's a Super Bright FLASH that shin on their faces from windows above.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did they just shoot at us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. Hold on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm seeing spots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sensors are down. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -     11/12/11

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 26 The Regina station floats alone in space, the pod docked the side. There's nothing except the Earth below, and no lights shine on the surface. No junk, no other ships or stations in space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 27 Anton and Val press buttons and look at screens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's the debris field?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's everything? They stare at the monitors, growing confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys ok?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tilda, look out the window. Are you seeing anything? The pod sensors are blank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 28 Tilda is fully awake for once. She pushes buttons. Anton' voice is a little garbled from holding the microphone too close to his mouth. He always does this, and makes the cr strain to hear him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tilda, can you raise ground control?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ground control, come in. Ground control switch to emergency channel. Ground control? Jimmy leans on the console next to her, holding circuits testing with a probe tool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not the sensors. Something happened. We're heading back in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It sounds like he might be holding the microphone too close. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11    1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think so?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 29 Anton and Valentina are in the airlock. The light turns g and they come out. Tilda helps them with their space suit

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any luck with Ground control?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no response. On any channel. There was a bright flash of light. Did you see that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, we saw it too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was it a Solar flare?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe. Doesn't seem like it. A strange HUMMING SOUND starts. Jimmy pokes his head in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good salvage?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who said you could take a break?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you ok?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're fine. I'll get on the coms. Check out what that humming noise is. We might have taken damage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Report to me in ten. Tilda rolls her eyes and goes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What can I do? Valentina shoves her space suit into Jimmy's hands. She a Anton walk off in the other direction. Jimmy tries to han the space suits on the rack. They don't fit. He tries aga Jimmy drops the space suits and follows after Tilda. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 30 Tilda walks past large devices, storage tanks, incinerato and cargo containers. The HUMMING is louder. She sees the Time Cube glowing with blue light. A FLASH OF LIGHT! The humming dies down. Tilda looks arou the scary, poorly lit and greasy room. Tilda turns suddenly and sees ANOTHER TILDA, in a dirtier jumpsuit, walking towards her. They both stop and stare a each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who the hell are you? TILDA2 is disoriented and scared. Her jumpsuit has differ computer symbols instead of standard station number stenc

dialogues.speaker: 30A
dialogues.text: Jimmy walking looking for Tilda hears A SCREAM O.S. He go around a corner at the end of the hall where it came from

dialogues.speaker: 30B
dialogues.text: Tilda2's arms framed, stuffing a female human leg into a hatch marked ORGANIC WASTE RECYCLING. She bends down and picks up a clean dry Tilda jumpsuit off the floor. Around the corner in a different area of the room, Jimmy pokes his head in and looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tilda? Jimmy finds a way around a large machine just as Tilda2 z up her jumpsuit, facing away. She has strange geometric l like tatoos on her back. He's struck by her picturesque beauty and doesn't realize he's staring. She turns and me eyes with him. He's very embarrassed and ducks back behin the machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this the laundry room? I was looking for the mess hall. Sorry if I surprised you. I thought I heard something. I didn't see anything. The heavy machinery starts grinding and humming. CRUNCHIN SAWING AND SPLATTERING SOUNDS. The light turns from red t green. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   18

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay well I'll see you on the bridge. Sorry. Jimmy turns and starts to head out, bumping into Tilda2 w a start. She's different; dissociated, laconic, very nerv

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was just going. Tilda2 (henceforth "Tilda") stares at him, shivering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, what's the matter? Jimmy pats her shoulder. She looks up and they meet eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you ok? She turns and runs away. Jimmy watches her go out the hat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You forgot your shoes! Jimmy picks up some sneakers. He doesn't notice blood dripping out from below the organic waste reprocessor as goes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 31 The HUMMING SOUND again: The Time Cube sits in deep shado glowing with faint blue light - the light dims and the humming stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 32 The wall is marked W.E.N.D.I. Orbital Station System Computer. Jimmy sits next to the computer with Tilda's sneakers. Wendi has a female voice this scene only. Jimmy hits buttons on the keyboard. The computer turns on

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello Jimmy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is the laundry room?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deck C. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   19

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Does Tilda have a boyfriend? The intercom buzzes. Anton voice is distorted to the edge comprehensibility.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy, how are the repairs coming? Jimmy? Get on the intercom Jimmy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'd better be getting all over this mainframe problem. I want hourly reports every half hour.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't understand-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just get on it, God damn it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roger that. Jimmy opens the top binder from a tall stack of binders. screen turns off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi? He hits buttons. It doesn't work now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 33 The vast view of the Earth from space. Pretty. The sunris terminator approaches Western Canada, as we drift slowly backwards into peaceful space. Nothing else is in orbit. Sanitation Station comes into view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 34 Jimmy sips juice from a sippy cup and goes back to solder wires in an open panel near the screen. He wears safety goggles, reads from a technical binder marked SONOVAC SYS REPAIR. The tall stack of binders is now a mess of them opened, scattered around.

dialogues.speaker: OMITTED SCENES 35-36
dialogues.text: 35 Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   19

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 37 Valentina sits at the communications station and holds a radio microphone. Anton works at consoles across the room Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the western alliance sanitation station Regina, in orbit, does anyone receive this message? Please respond. This is the sanitation station Regina, Please respond. She puts down the microphone, tweaks some knobs and pushe some buttons. Anton comes over to her and presses buttons at her statio

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm trying to figure out what you're doing wrong. She slams shut a procedure binder. Jimmy comes in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you got the mainframe back up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's taking me a bit longer than I thought. I might need to call down for some parts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's nothing out there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't see how that's possible. It has to be a communications problem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're having a communication problem right now. I'm telling you there's nothing out there. We need Wendi to do an analysis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why didn't anyone tell me? I have to get back to Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not happening any time soon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So we're stranded. The full weight of their predicament settles on them. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 38 A large table, kitchenette, free weights, shake weight, b shelf with board games. Val's Rubber Duckie sits on the s with a few other personal items. Anton cycles an elliptic exercise machine. Valentina comes in with leotards and stretches next to him. Anton stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any luck?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're worried. Don't worry. We're going to be fine. He leans in to give her a kiss, she leans away from his k as she stretches. He sits to stretch next to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to put in for reassignment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not this again. Val-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's always something on deep space transports. A chance to see the galaxy a little.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's all the same.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then maybe I'll realize what I'm missing and come back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about us? What about me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sick of you. I want to puke every time I hear your voice. You completely disgust me in every way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If this is because of the other night, I already told you that was because of the bad egg sandwiches I ate after the refrigeration system went down. That was a one-off thing. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   22

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It isn't because you had indigestion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it the sex?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sex is fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then what's your problem? She continues her stretching and workout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 39 Tilda pokes a water filtration system. A sign says DANGER HIGH VOLTAGE. She pokes the wires. A SNAP of high voltage short circuit. She takes out her finger, it's burnt a lit She pokes the power box again, searching and exploring, unfamiliar with the world around her and troubled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 40 Jimmy, Anton and Val play scrabble. Val makes a word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Giraffe." Eighteen points. Anton writes down the score. Jimmy turns the board to fac him. Jimmy places tiles as he eats his soy protein sandwi He spells "blorxr" and writes down his points. Valentina eyeballs him. Anton rotates the game board. He ponders wh word to make. He moves his letters around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not a word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do I have to play?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to take breaks. Keep to a schedule. Schedule says scrabble. How's your sandwich?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not very good. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   23

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well that's all there is until breakfast tomorrow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's for breakfast?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandwiches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thirty seconds Anton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there anything to eat besides sandwiches?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you repair food dispensers?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well then there's nothing else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twenty seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So Jimmy, is there someone back on earth waiting for you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. I have a girlfriend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you actually have a girlfriend?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a girl I'm friends with, I was planning on asking her to out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you actually friends?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We know each other. I know her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Times up Anton. Minus one point. Tilda comes in and looks through the cupboards in the kitchen. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi Tilda. Want a sandwich? We saved you the pickled onion and cheese. She ignores them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you looking for? What's she looking for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fifteen seconds overtime. Hurry up and make a word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm making a word. Tilda knocks little containers around searching the cupboards. She carelessly knocks things off the shelf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tilda would you stop making that racket? What the hell are you looking for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need to make decisions faster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't rush into things and make irrational snap decisions, like some people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leaving you isn't a snap decision.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's totally inexplicable. Jimmy gets up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys need a minute?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sit down. We're playing scrabble. A FLASH outside the window. Tilda turns, very scared, and looks out the window. Jimmy goes to the window next to he

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was that? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   25 SMASH! The sound of an impact, like a car accident. The r trembles. METAL CREAKING NOISES. Things jiggle and fall o the shelves. Tilda stares at Jimmy, scared. Val and Anton are bracing themselves for more. The shakin stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was an impact.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 41 Red lights blink, warnings flash on monitors. Valentina a Anton run in and sit, hit buttons. Jimmy takes a station presses buttons too, scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pressure nominal. Jimmy, check the CNW3. That thing there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know what I'm looking at.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Orbital position? Jimmy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Orbital position is...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other console.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got it. The fail-safe thrusters kicked in. Orbit is stable. Tilda comes in and sits at a console, hits buttons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice of you to join us, Tilda. Valentina looks through binders stacked on a shelf, finds one, pulls it, and flips to a page.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Collision checklist?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Working on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did it hit us? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -     11/12/11 Jimmy's computer screen shows the exterior of the space station - a DENTED PANEL with something yellow stuck in i The screen is too fuzzy to tell what it is. Anton looks o Jimmy's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks like... I don't know. An asteroid would have done more damage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's small... and yellow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 42 Anton, suited up puts on his helmet, presses buttons and steps into the airlock. He resolutely presses the button close the door. Red lights flood the airlock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 43 Valentina, Tilda and Jimmy watch the monitors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's almost there. He's got it. Tilda, make sure our orbit is locked. Tilda! Tilda sits facing away from them, worried.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snap out of it Tilda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you give her a break?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you say something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take it easy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't get on my bad side Jimmy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Val, meet me in the airlock module right away. Tilda turns to face them. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   27

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 45 Valentina Tilda and Jimmy wait by the doors. The red ligh comes on in the airlock. Anton is in the airlock in full space gear. Red light turns off inside airlock. AIR HISSI SOUND. The inner airlock hatch opens. Valentina helps Anton off with his helmet. In his gloved is a slightly burned rubber duckie. Anton takes off his s top and pants, down to his underwear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this your rubber duckie?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks like it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was dented into the outer hull. Valentina takes the duckies and walks off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did this get into space?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You tell me. Anton follows her.

dialogues.speaker: 45A
dialogues.text: Valentina sits at the table. Two rubber ducks on the tabl her regular one and the slightly burned one from space. A comes over to her with Jimmy, in his underwear. Tilda sit the far end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many of those things do you have?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One. Anton picks them up, looks them all over, looks at the bottoms. One says V+G, the other says G+V underneath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're identical. Why would you deny it's yours? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   27

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because it's not. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -     11/12/11 Jimmy looks at the ducks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're not identical. See? Tilda comes between them and checks out the ducks urgentl Jimmy leans in next to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it Tilda?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know something about this? Tilda walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Has she said anything today?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's acting weird.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hadn't noticed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 48 The station's orbit comes into the sunlight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 49 Jimmy wakes up. His clock says "06:00". He has bed-head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 50 Anton practices martial arts with multiple styles in his karate gear. Jimmy passes by, gets a sandwich.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your shift started ten minutes ago. Valentina sips coffee at the table as Jimmy walks past. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coffee machine is still broken. It barely made one cup so there's nothing left for you. Fix it today please. Jimmy walks past Val's room, glances in. From his pov see

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 52 Tilda searches through the drawers and rummages around everywhere. A duckie on the table. Jimmy comes to the doo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you lose something? Tilda puts her finger to her lips like Shhhh and walks pa him out into the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 55 Jimmy has a three-ring binder marked `"W.E.N.D.I." - CENT COMPUTER - REPAIR OPS MANUAL'. He peels open a foil-wrapp sandwich and eats while he reads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi? Nothing happens. He presses some buttons and reads more. Jimmy kicks the computer in frustration. Tilda comes in. She looks all around the room and at the computer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh hey Tilda! What are you looking for? Tilda pokes the computer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you worked in space a long time? I'm still getting used to it. I thought I'd like it better. A lot less excitement than I figured. I guess it's a good thing though - after what happened to Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   3

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, whatever happened out there we're still alive. What do you think happened? Tilda looks at Jimmy. She places her hand on the computer

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm testing the circuits coming off the recursive logic decoupler for a memory leak. Want to help? Tilda kicks the computer. The computer screen flickers on numbers scroll on the monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you say anything? Jimmy hits the intercom button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton? I fixed the computer. Tilda sits down and flips through a binder. Jimmy sits cl to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you're looking for something. I can help. Just tell me. Tilda is about to say something- but Valentina comes in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did it. Took you long enough. Anton comes in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally! Wendi?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's loading. The screen settles on the "W.A.S.S. REGINA" station logo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi? Respond. The computer's voice is glitchy at first, then improves. now sounds male.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bleep Blorp Hello Commander Balvenie. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   3

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why does it have a man's voice?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Human interface systems are operating at default settings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I like the old voice better. Fix the voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi; status report. Numbers scroll on the screen. Cryptic shapes. Progress ba

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several systems are sub-nominal including communications, vector processing and memory modules 23 to 93. Logs show a collision has occurred.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was the rubber duck. Jimmy types on the keyboard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well done, Jimmy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi, can you reach ground control? Numbers scroll on the screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No communications. Relay stations not responding. Initial analysis is negative.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi, what happened to us? The computer screens flicker off with a `power down' soun

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi? They look at Jimmy with every kind of hate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know what happened. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   32 Valentina leaves, brushing past Jimmy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fix it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think Tilda can help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure. She's useless to me. Tilda, help Jimmy. Tilda walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or go. That's fine too. Work on that attitude Tilda. Am I the only one trying to maintain order on this station? I'm telling you it's lonely at the top. Jimmy tries to appreciate this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 57 [No yellow shields on windows.] Jimmy wanders down the ha wearing one of Anton's jumpsuits, reading the technical binder. It's darker. Tilda is standing looking out the wi into space, with her reflection in the glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi Tilda. Trouble sleeping? Tilda looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Want to play scrabble?

dialogues.speaker: 57A
dialogues.text: Tilda and Jimmy are in the middle of a scrabble game.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's happening to us Tilda? What's with the rubber ducks? She looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton thinks you're space-crazy. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   3 Tilda makes the word "oxyphenbutazone" and looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sometimes you do seem kind of distant. Tilda turns the board to face her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess you're just dealing with things in your own way. Tilda has an idea! She grabs all the tiles and starts mak words. SECRET. INTRUDER ON BOARD. DANGER. Jimmy leans over looking. Tilda is very serious. Anton leans in (out of nowhere).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to connect the words. Jimmy knocks the board up in nervous reaction to hide the message.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did I startle you? I'm everywhere Jimmy. I've got my eye on you. Is that my jumpsuit? Who said you could wear my jumpsuit?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't pack anything else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to earn that uniform. You can't just put it on. Wash it carefully, fold it and put it back. Jimmy gets up, hesitantly leaves Tilda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you, shape up. Anton goes to his quarters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 58 Valentina looks at her 2 rubber ducks, Anton comes in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is so special about that rubber duck? Why do you keep it around? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   33

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fond memories.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fond? Anton takes one and looks at the V+G written on the botto

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. What's wrong with that? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -     11/12/11

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are they more fond or less fond than memories of me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. It's not all about you. I want to get off this station Anton. I wanted out of here before we were stranded. I need a change of scenery. I'm sick of this place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, whoever gave you the rubber duck has nothing to do with your change of heart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. It has nothing to do with Gary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Gary? So we have a name now. Right... Gary. So what's Gary up to these days? Do you keep in touch? Valentina grabs her duck, bath robe and towel from the ro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I haven't spoken to him in years. He was just a friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've just happen to have a growing collection of his bath toys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is none of your business. You and I are separated now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are? Val grabs her 2nd duckie from Anton and exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Since when?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 59 A bunch of cables run from an open panel below the comput screen. Jimmy (wearing his old clothing) shoves all the computer parts into the wall and closes the panel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beep. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   3

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi, can you identify me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are Station Engineering Specialist Jimmy Anderson. You are a Libra. Your favorite color is blue. Your favorite food is chocolate cake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How are you doing? Jimmy types, flips switches, leafs through binders and te circuits under the following scene. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   3

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All systems are nominal, however I have not received a mission protocol update from Western Alliance Ground Control. How are you feeling?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks like your social interface program is back online.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes Jimmy, it is. I am pleased that you noticed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you have a man's voice?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am operating on default human interface settings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton hates it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would you like to select a different interface protocol?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No stay like this. Can you show me the station video monitors? A grid of grainy black and white video cameras comes up. One screen shows Valentina walking down the hall angrily her bath robe, towel and 2 rubber duckies. Another monitor shows a medium shot of Tilda kneeling in engineering area next to a wall panel marked T518. She lo around nervously and opens it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy, I appear to have an open access port in my T518 array. Jimmy zooms in, it's grainy. Tilda pulls out a row of circuits labeled "T518 D7", removes a small circuit board looks at it. She closes the panel. Jimmy watches Tilda on the monitor screen: she sits back unzips her flight suit. He leans in towards the monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are women so complicated? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   3

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you wish to improve a social relationship I recommend engaging in friendly conversation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's your T518 array used for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: T518 is a language processor for human interface systems. On the monitor we can see Tilda take the circuit board an jam it into her torso on her right side. The screen garbles slightly with electrical interference. Jimmy zooms in but it's hard to see what's going on. Tild rubs her side, there's no mark and the circuit board is g She zips up her jumpsuit and tries to talk with fax sound

dialogues.speaker: ZZZBBOOOORRRRRPXKXS
dialogues.text: Jimmy watches the monitor with distracted fascination.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you ever been in love, Wendi?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love being the orbital sanitation station mainframe computer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You didn't fix the voice. Jimmy quickly switches off the video monitor screen and t around. Anton comes in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's stuck this way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the male version of Wendi? Winston? Walter? Walter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi is used for both sexes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew a guy named Wendi. I called him Wendi once. Maybe by mistake. I think his name was Wendal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're calling you Walter from now on. Okay Walter? Walter. Respond. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   36 No response for a second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My name is Wendi. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   3

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See if you can fix the coffee machine next.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong with the coffee machine?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How should I know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not sure this power converter is going to hold and we're out of spares. Wendi could go down again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go look in the salvage bay, there's probably something you can use.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ok.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, ok. Jimmy gets up and goes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 61 The room is dark and a bit spooky, besides the better-lit area around the tub where Valentina splashes around. Her robe is hung nearby. She looks at her rubber ducks, focus the slightly burned one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you come from? She puts the ducks in the water with her. The ducks bob o the soapy waves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 62 A ship explodes in the vector graphics game SPACE WAR. An turns off the game and turns to a different screen. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   3

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi, Check your files on crew psychology, and emergency situation management. Cancel that. Anything on relationship counselling?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My files appear corrupted. Would you like to perform a relational database integrity check and defragment my core memory?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Hold on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A full scan and reboot will take approximately six hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Abort! Anton ponders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you have on Valentina's work history?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Full records are online.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did she work with someone named Gary?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valentina worked as an intern with Scientist Gary Pinback, Antarctica research station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is this guy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Professor Pinback was a leading expert in transdimensional transportation theory and-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes yes. I mean what was he like? Did he have a lot of girlfriends? Do you have any vital statistics, medical records, history of sexually transmitted diseases?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   3

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pictures with his shirt off like at a beach maybe? Any data on his anatomy? Anton leans close to a screen that scrolls data.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My god he was hung like a donkey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 66 Boxes fall off the shelves with a CRASH. Jimmy moves them of the way. The wall is marked SALVAGE BAY 12. HAZARDOUS AREA. HARD HAT ZONE. Other construction site iconography. Jimmy pulls aside some junk and scrap, finding Gary's Tim Cube they salvaged from the crash. It looks useful to him The device has a control pad and sockets for plugs. It's little heavy. He turns it over and examines it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the heck is this? He fumbles and drops it. A FLASH of light whites-out the room. Jimmy rubs his eyes and looks at the box - blue lig glow inside and it starts to HUM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 67 Valentina snoozes with a wet cloth over her eyes in the t The FLASH of light passes through. The burned space-ducki sits on the tub edge, as if watching her. Strange HUMMING from Jimmy's device is heard. THE DUCKIE'S EYES MOVE TO FOCUS ON VALENTINA. Valentina takes off a wet cloth from her face and looks around. The duckie doesn't move. She puts the cloth back The rubber duckie is definitely watching her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 68 Continued scene. Anton gets up, sits down. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   4

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was he known for? Did he have a good sense of humor? Was it better than mine?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Professor Pinback theorized that it was possible to transport life forms between dimensions of time and space to parallel realities.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That doesn't sound like sexy or glamorous work does it? It sounds like a lot of math.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dimensional transport may be an explanation for the absence of human life detected outside the station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So how long did Val and Gary work together?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Approximately three years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did they go on any trips together?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That information is not on file.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're completely useless Wendi, you know that? Absolutely stupid and useless. What good are you? Anton goes back into his game of SPACE WAR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 69 Valentina snoozes in the tub. The alive rubber duckie sco past the normal duckie and slips into the water. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   41 The duckie approaches Valentina in the water. Tentacles appear from under it. It's getting closer to her face. Valentina reaches up and hits the intercom suddenly, not seeing the duckie, causing a splash to hide the duckie wi bubbles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell is that humming sound? Hello? Anton? Anton?

dialogues.speaker: 69A
dialogues.text: Jimmy looks at the menacing glowing device. He shakes it. humming sound and blue glow dies out. He gathers up some cables and the box and walks out.

dialogues.speaker: 69B
dialogues.text: Valentina zips up her jumpsuit, tosses a wet towel next t the duckies on the ground. After she walks away with her robe, the towel moves - the duck is under it.

dialogues.speaker: 69C
dialogues.text: Jimmy strolls in with the time cube in hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 73 Tilda sits by the sandwich machine. Anton comes over to h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's it going Tilda? Tilda stares at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Since all these strange events started you haven't said a word, haven't slept at all as far as I can see. I've noticed. You haven't eaten. I can see you're deeply troubled by what's happening. Frankly, I'm a little disappointed that you haven't held it together. You're a trained officer. Things might be a bit grim but I assure you I've made it through worse situations than this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   4

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You just need a positive attitude. Try a smile once in a while. Can you do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   4

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let a smile be your umbrella. Can you get back on the team? Tilda stares at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not hearing an answer. Jimmy comes in with the Time Cube and cables from the sal room and puts it on the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've found the time cube. They share astonishment at Tilda's finally speaking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that what it is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's a Time cube?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to make sure it never activates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean by activate? I mean it was on when I found it. Valentina comes in with her bath robe. She sees them and Time Cube.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell is going on? I heard this strange humming noise...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All life on earth just ended.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought all life on earth ended last week. Valentina throws down her bath robe and goes to her quart

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great Anton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now she's mad at me? This one isn't on me.

dialogues.speaker: OMITTED SCENES 74
dialogues.text: 74 Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   4

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 81 It's dark and scary. The duckie scuttles in and out of shadows, leaving a thin trail of mucus. Just before it disappears we see its silhouette rear up near the door an let loose a bone-chilling throaty howl of rage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 82 The station orbits the earth. The Quaaack echoes into spa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 83 Valentina is pacing, drying her hair. Anton barges into t room, with Valentina's bath robe in hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's speaking now? Since when? And why is she telling you all these things and not me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Calm down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am calm. Valentina throws a towel at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are you mad at me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you're excluding me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you were in the control room instead of taking baths, you might know what's going on. By the way, you and this Gary guy were a lot more than friends. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   4

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How would you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi told me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's an invasion of my privacy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So it's true. I knew it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 84 Jimmy and Tilda examine the Time Cube.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a chronotronic quantum flux transfer event generator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah? He reaches for it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the most dangerous machine ever created.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Jimmy pulls his hand back and sits on his hands looking a the cube.

dialogues.speaker: 84A
dialogues.text: A slow track around the control room at ground level. It' empty dark and scary. Camera stops on a chair that drips bit of slime.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 85 Anton sits with his back to Valentina. They're not talkin Valentina continues to fix up after just having a bath. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -     11/12/11

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lets put the Gary stuff aside. Maybe you used to see him, maybe you were just friends, whatever. The important thing is you're over him and you're with me now. Lets not fight like this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right Anton. Anton is encouraged by her sweet voice and friendly tone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the point of me fighting with a shit for brains, whiney little half pint control freak with no balls, stinky stupid fuck with no sense of style, charm or personal hygiene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you don't want    to talk right now. I'm going to    go get a cup of coffee. Why don't    you adjust your attitude and join    me when you're ready. Anton goes.

dialogues.speaker: 85A
dialogues.text: Continued. Jimmy sits next to Tilda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a robot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are? Tilda puts her finger near Jimmy's arm. A small spark jum

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow. Do that again. She does it again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow. Stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I run on electricity. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   45

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 86 The Rubber Duckie (duck1) At Anton's keyboard. SLOW KEYBOARD TYPING SOUNDS. ECU from below: The rubber duckie's eyes darting left and right with the keyboard sounds. It's typing something, wh breathing asthmatically. It drips some slime. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   4

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 87 Jimmy eats a sandwich at the table next to Tilda. Anton c in and tries again to make a cup of coffee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tilda's a robot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No she isn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm pretty sure she is. Valentina comes in, sees the Time Cube glowing. Anton pul out a chair for her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice to hear you speaking again Tilda. Valentina sits away from Anton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never spoken before today. Where I come from, we don't need to speak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've all heard you speak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've come from a mirror universe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Since when?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay, tell them what you told me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone has been travelling across parallel universes causing disaster on a galactic scale. Our Earth is almost completely destroyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   4

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We discovered that this station is the nexus point of all the damaged realities. We had just once chance to send me here, to take your Tilda's place, in order to stop this time cube from being activated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My station is the nexus?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we didn't activate anything. Did you turn it on? Jimmy lifts the box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's got some kind of port at the bottom which I haven't figured out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put down the time cube. Jimmy puts it down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you turn it on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Not really. It turned itself on. I might have dropped it. It was on before I found it. BEEP BEEP BEEP - a beeping sound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi, what's the matter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A power fluctuation has been detected in my command relays in the control room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy? Didn't you fix that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. This is new. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   48

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Val, want to check it out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to be involved, this is being involved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine. Keep an eye on the robot.

dialogues.speaker: 87A
dialogues.text: Valentina walks through the connector pod and into the passageway, down toward the control room. No yellow shiel

dialogues.speaker: 87B
dialogues.text: Valentina comes in. The O.S. BEEP BEEP BEEP from before p in here. She hits a button on a control panel and it turn off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nominal, Nominal, five by five... She hits the intercom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go ahead Val.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks like a false alarm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Come to the rec room. I made coffee. She turns off the intercom. There's some slime.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's been messing with the- Valentina looks to her left. There's a rubber duck sittin there. She's confused. It moves toward her. She's paralyz with horror. It has tentacles peeking out under it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   4 She starts to move away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, don't run. My legs are short, and it hurts. Valentina. It hurts to exist. I shouldn't be here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the... Fff... Duck?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm stuck in a transdimensional rift across the twelfth dimension. Gary lurches toward Valentina. She recoils.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't run away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need to get back to my dimension. I need my time cube. Valentina, it's me, Gary. Gary moves very close to her. He puts a tentacle on her h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My God you're beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't be... Gary?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. It's me.

dialogues.speaker: 87C
dialogues.text: Anton pours coffee, offers to Tilda who declines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't drink anything. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So... you were saying you came here to replace our Tilda and stop someone from using this Time Cube, but he's not here. And what happened to our Tilda?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An accident happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is she around here? Somewhere? Anton eats his sandwich.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, you can see why I'd be concerned to hear a member of my crew is missing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Things didn't go as planned. I couldn't explain it to the other Tilda. Professor Pinback isn't here like he was supposed to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute. Gary Pinback?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the guy who's supposed to be on this station?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Son of a bitch.

dialogues.speaker: 87D
dialogues.text: Cutting back to Val and Gary having their chat. Val is mo relaxed, starting to take this in stride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did this happen, Gary? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -     11/12/11

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There was an accident. The cube was activated in my escape and I was shunted through a dimensional vortex into this stupid body. But I was on my way here for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I promised you that one day I'd give you the world. I came here to keep that promise. I can take you away from all this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gary... That was years ago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Until I can activate the time cube I will continue to bleed across the dimensional boundary... I don't know what I will become.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That sounds painful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's very painful. I need your help Valentina. There isn't much time. ALARMS GO OFF - RED SIREN LIGHTS. Valentina turns to look around. She turns back and Gary is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gary?

dialogues.speaker: 87E
dialogues.text: Continued scene of Anton, Tilda and Jimmy. The RED CHERRY LIGHTS turn on here as they just did in the control room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell is going on now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gary must be onboard. This is how it begins. I'm already too late. Tilda sits on the floor depressed. Anton goes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to the control room. You keep an eye on... the robot. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   51

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She has a name. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm telling you, if that son of a bitch is on my station I'm going to find him. You two stay put. Anton leaves. Jimmy sits next to Tilda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. What's the matter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cube has been activated. There's nothing I can do to stop it. Infinite universes will be destroyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can try. Look, last week I never thought I'd be working orbit. Everyone told me it was impossible. I didn't have the training. I didn't have the stomach. People said, that Jimmy, he's never getting off Earth. But I got myself together and paid a guy a hundred and fifty bucks to forge my certification forms and the next thing you know, here I am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't mean to kill her. The other Tilda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sure you didn't. Hey, lets go use Wendi's cameras to see if we can find Gary if he's on board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ok.

dialogues.speaker: 87F
dialogues.text: Tilda and Jimmy walk with the Time Cube. Tilda stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm glad you can speak. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's something else I couldn't say before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't trust Valentina.

dialogues.speaker: 87G
dialogues.text: Valentina is looking around. She can't find Gary. Anton c in. He presses a button and it turns off the siren sounds cherry lights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. The control relays are all offline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gary is onboard the station. Valentina freezes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you talked to him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi, is there another man on this station besides myself?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy is onboard the station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Besides Jimmy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No Anton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where the hell is he hiding? What are you two up to? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get off my case Anton. I don't know what you're talking about. Who said Gary is here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tilda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She says she's a robot. Do you believe everything everyone tells you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got the second duck from him. Admit that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you want answers we should go down there and grill the robot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine. Lets start with that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's probably the one who blew out the control systems. Whatever we do, we can't leave them with the cube anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the big deal with this cube? SUDDENLY THE ROOM JOLTS. Red warnings on monitors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 100 Tilda and Jimmy brace themselves. The room trembles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy? We've got a situation here. Take Tilda to the computer room and see if you can get the control system back up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're in the computer room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you to stay put. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ok. He turns off the intercom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know what's happening?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. I don't think we have much time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not much time like a few days?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hours. The room shakes again. The lights flicker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 108 Val and Anton sit at the controls as the room shakes. Evi metal creaking noises tear through. Alarms sound. More screens turn to static and garbled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something is definitely wrong. Check the air pressure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. I haven't been totally honest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh? The rubber duck (duck 2) scuttles across the floor behind them but Anton doesn't see it. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   5

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gary is onboard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is the bastard? How the hell did he get on the station?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You brought him in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When did I do that? Valentina notices that Gary (Duck 2) is in front of Anton hiding on a shelf, dripping slime.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's just come for the time cube. That's all he needs to get back to his dimension and put things right. Its eyes glow faintly red.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure. Naturally. He just wants his time cube. He's not interested in you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's the only one that can send us home and set things right. Anton follows her gaze and sees the duck there.
