dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell is that? Anton moves around and slowly approaches it. He takes out laser blaster and charges it. The Duck cowers and backs deeper into the corner of the shelf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton, you're scaring him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Him? Hello little guy. Don't be afraid. We mean you no harm. Hey there. Val what the hell is this thing? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   5 He gets ready to fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's Gary. Anton slowly moves closer to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? This thing? Anton points his laser. Gary trembles with fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Anton pulls the trigger. It goes click click.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's odd. The batteries must be- Gary LEAPS at Anton's head. They crash through the room a attacks him. Papers fly from binders thrown around. Anton screams. The laser pistol is knocked to the floor, broken Blood splatters against a console, and across Valentina's face. Val screams, staring at the off-screen attack. Anto thrown down, he turns around and tries to see where the d is. He's scratched up. It scuttles away down the hall beh him, out of his sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did that little bastard go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 110 Valentina pulls a first-aid kit off the wall and opens it Anton has a trivial cut on his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It sure is strong for a little guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you to be careful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why didn't you just tell me about him? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   58

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I tried to tell you. Valentina cleans his cut. She digs through the kit for ta

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How is your head?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It hurts. Valentina sticks a band-aid on Anton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you know what this thing was when we brought it on board?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, of course not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look what he did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was frightened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whose side are you on? A noise down the hall. Anton pulls the handlebar off the elliptical exercise machine and holds it like a club as h goes to one side of the room next to the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you see it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Anton peeks down the hall quickly. He reaches to draw his laser blaster - his holster is empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something is coming. Stay back. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   59

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I won't hurt him much. I'll just subdue him, okay? That's fair, isn't it? Jimmy runs around the corner into the room.

dialogues.speaker: AHHHH
dialogues.text: Anton's war-cry is spent on Jimmy who jumps back frighten

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm looking for you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have a guest onboard. Tilda follows carrying the Time Cube.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened to your face?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A rubber duck attacked me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 111 It's dark. A duck-shape scuttles along the floor, casting flickering shadows on the wall (duck 2, framed larger) Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   60

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gggrrrrroooarr!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 113 Tilda opens a compartment and locates sandwiches. Jimmy s tinkering with the busted laser pistol through the scene. Valentina takes the sandwiches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So it's some kind of animal?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. And it's growing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How big is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like a small dog maybe. And it bites. Hard. What have you got?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rice, butter, carrot jam.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God help us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ham.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, ham. Give me the ham. Valentina reluctantly gives up the ham sandwich. They eat Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   6

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: We checked with Wendi. It doesn't look like Gary is on board.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: The duck... is Gary.

dialogues.speaker: TILDA
dialogues.text: How?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Valentina has something she'd like to tell us.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINA
dialogues.text: I don't know all the facts.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: Go on. Please.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINA
dialogues.text: The time cube sent him here through the duck. It was an accident.

dialogues.speaker: JIMMY
dialogues.text: This is the Gary that Tilda says destroyed Earth. He's a duck?

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINA
dialogues.text: He's on this station. He's part man, part rubber duck, part something else.

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: And I'm going to kill him.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINA
dialogues.text: How is that going to help?

dialogues.speaker: ANTON
dialogues.text: He tried to eat my face, Val.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINA
dialogues.text: He's going through a lot of changes. He's not thinking straight. But he's the only one that set things right if we give him the Time Cube.

dialogues.speaker: TILDA
dialogues.text: He's not here to help us.

dialogues.speaker: VALENTINA
dialogues.text: I suppose you've helped us? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   6

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm with Tilda on this one for now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up Jimmy, no one asked you. METAL CREAKING NOISE O.S., sound of cables snapping.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry Val. Plan A: we get control of Gary. We're going to assume he's only going to keep smashing things. Jimmy, Tilda, work on Wendi. If we can get eyes on him and close doors remotely we can trap him- Another SMASHING noise echoes through the frame of the station. Distant creaking metal sounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Val and I will look for the duck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said yourself he's not thinking straight. I'm definitely not giving him the Time Cube - that's what got us into this mess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do we have any weapons? Anton opens a drawer. He spills out a handful of disposab plastic knives on the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone take one. They do. Jimmy bends his. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   6

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No lasers? Microwave rifles?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laser's broke. Make do. Jimmy grabs the pieces of the broken laser pistol, plasti knives and half a sandwich in his pockets, then puts the Cube into a backpack. Anton takes the backpack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take that. Jimmy lets him have it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll keep it safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 114 Anton, Val, Jimmy, Tilda walk into the four-way intersect then pair off in different directions. Anton has his backpack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 115 Valentina comes in, looks around. She pokes the space sui

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gary? Anton pokes his head in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Val?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you see him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. We should split up. Use the intercom if you find him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you going to do with him Anton?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to ask him nicely to stop destroying my space station for starters. That's reasonable isn't it? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   64

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I suppose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I'm going to kill him as hard as I can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 116 Anton searches through the room. He's jumpy. Scratched up papers, claw marks, burns, broken pieces of equipment. Sl trails. He bumps into a hanging cable, startling him. But it's no tentacle, it's just a cable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 117 Jimmy walks through with Tilda. The computers buzz and li blink. They look around for Gary cautiously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy? Wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it? Tilda gives Jimmy a little kiss. Suddenly his eyes open w as something happens when their lips touch, time slows do and everything gets brighter, fades to:

dialogues.speaker: 117A
dialogues.text: Jimmy and Tilda face each other in a haze of glowing ligh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is cool. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -      11/12/11 Tilda opens her mouth and electronic synthesizer sounds c out for just a quick instant before they:

dialogues.speaker: 117B
dialogues.text: Flash back to reality, Tilda moves away from Jimmy. They' back to when they were mid-kiss. Jimmy falls over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Woah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you ok? Jimmy is stunned. The room shakes from an O.S. EXPLOSION.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy?! Jimmy looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In my dimension we all run on electricity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have a headache. But it was nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry Jimmy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, we can try other   ways of showing how we feel. There   are ways we do it in this dimension   you might not have heard about   yet... The ROOM SHAKES HARD and binders fall off the shelves, th lights flicker, metal snapping NOISES O.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no time for that now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right.

dialogues.speaker: OMITTED
dialogues.text: 118 Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   66

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 119 Tentacles of Gary (Duck2) slithers past. His tentacles ba the table.

dialogues.speaker: ARRGGH
dialogues.text: Gary flutters in a blur into the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 120 Tilda and Jimmy try to access the computer. It's not work

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The power system is still on. We need to locate the damaged circuits. They could be anywhere between here and the control room. Gary must have done something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me ask Wendi. She reaches into the computer panel and finds an RS232 ca

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you going to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Turn around. Tilda unzips her jumpsuit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ok. Jimmy turns around. Tilda sticks the RS232 cable down the front of her jumpsuit bottoms area and feels around with cable until she finds her socket. CLICK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Accessing. Jimmy really wants to know what's going on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No peeking. Jimmy turns away again, facing the computer monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you explain what you're doing? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   6

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm accessing Wendi's backup system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean what are you doing with that RS232 cable? Numbers flash on the screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello Tilda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello Wendi. Central logic processor is up. All systems are online - the control interface has been disconnected. Tilda keeps accessing the computer with her brain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was the duck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gary? What is it trying to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look. The monitor shows a wire-frame diagram of the space stati in motion, with trajectories and readings. A red circular line indicates the orbit of the station, and it intersect with Earth. The little icon of the station is slowly movi on that line toward the `red zone'. "WARNING" text blinks

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The station's orbit has been altered. We're going to hit the atmosphere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long do we have?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About twenty eight minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you sure? She's sure. Jimmy hits the intercom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton? Anton? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   6

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The intercoms are locked out. We have to get to the control room. Tilda turns away, unplugs the cable with a shiver and pul the cable out of her pants. She zips up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're going to have to explain that later. Tilda reaches her hand toward Jimmy. Jimmy puts his hand A spark jumps between their hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Jimmy. You don't have a static discharge buffer. You're completely made of meat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meat that loves you, Tilda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It may not be possible for us to overcome our physiological differences in this universe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It sure would be fun to try. Tilda smiles in agreement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 121 Valentina looks under the communications equipment. There half-open compartment at the end of the room, filled with deep shadows. A wall panel is also open. She moves slowly toward it. She peeks in the wall panel. empty. She moves on toward the other compartment. Valentina reaches slowly toward the open compartment, her heart racing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gary? Are you there Gary? We have to talk. She opens the compartment - just a pair of dusty headphon inside. She relaxes. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   6 Jimmy runs in, startling her. She bangs her head on the control panel.

dialogues.speaker: AHHHHHH
dialogues.text: Valentina punches his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow. Stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You scared the crap out of me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Anton?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We split up. What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're falling out of orbit. Gary's done something to the guidance system. Have you found him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not between here and engineering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then there's only one place left he could be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 122 Anton is looking at shady spots under the sleeping cots, holding the elliptical machine handle as a club. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   70 The room is full of dark corners; each one seems to hold promise of aliens bursting out. Anton explores cautiously

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anton! Anton spins around. Tilda points past him. Anton looks. T rubber duck is on the shelf! Anton smashes it with the handle!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got it! He stomps on it. Squeak Squeak. Squeak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Anton lifts his foot. It squeaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the normal one. A SCUTTLING SOUND behind them. They turn and look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you hear that? Anton goes to her. They catch a glimpse of tentacle pokin out of Anton's room. It disappears around the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's horrible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tilda, get back. He hands her the backpack with the Time Cube. Tilda takes and backs away.

dialogues.speaker: 122A
dialogues.text: Anton comes out of his room followed by Tilda, peeking ar and trying to see where Gary might be hiding in his room across the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be careful. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   7 Tilda stands in the hall of the crew quarters outside the door. Scuttle scuttle sounds. Anton goes near his room, l around. He creeps toward the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you? Hiding. Not so tough now are ya Gary? You'd better hide. Scuttle sound. Anton goes left, toward his coffee table, aiming his handlebar, guessing where Gary is hiding. Anto almost at the door. Anton turns right. The shadow of Gary (Duck 3) rises up n to his bed: the tentacles were just the tip: it's grown larger now. It bares teeth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is the Time Cube?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What Time Cube?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I must have it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You come on my space station, try to steal my girlfriend, turn the place upside down and make demands for time cubes. Who do you think I am? Anton prepares to strike. The duck trembles with exciteme and rage. Anton grits his teeth.

dialogues.speaker: AHHHHHHHH
dialogues.text: Anton swings his weapon high over his head and charges! Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11    7

dialogues.speaker: 122C
dialogues.text: Tilda watches from the hallway outside Anton's room: A SUDDEN FLURRY OF MOTION as Gary attacks Anton, SNARLING Pillows and household items are torn up and thrown around Crashing sounds. Tilda ducks down, unable to watch the violence. Sounds: Anton yelling, things breaking. Violent crunches and punches. Clanging. Blood sprays on the wall next to Tilda. She's horrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy and Valentina come from around the corner at the fa end of the hall and stop when they hear the sound of THUM SCUTTLE SCUTTLE. They cautiously peer down the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tilda? Tilda comes out of Anton's room, some blood spray on her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need help.

dialogues.speaker: 122D
dialogues.text: They clear off the table and lie Anton down. He's twitchi Valentina touches him and backs away in horror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is the first-aid kit? Jimmy looks around, pulls a medical kit from the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's leaking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valentina, get some water. Tilda first-aid examines Anton. He coughs up blood. Jimmy turns around and there's no Valentina.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valentina? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   7

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 125 Valentina sits in a flight deck chair looking at red emergency monitor warning messages. She sits facing the passageway, looks at the blood on her hands. A husky rasp breathing sound comes from Gary who hides around the edge the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gary. Why are you doing this? Gary's voice answers from the shadows. It sounds bigger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you'll kill me as well if the station falls out of orbit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, are you're with this Anton guy now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was for a while. Not sure now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He fights like a girl. Do you think he'd cross alternate dimensions for you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I travelled through time for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   7 Gary leans out for a moment (duck3) revealing a little mo of himself and then slinks back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're mutating faster and faster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could put everything back the way it was. Would you want that? Would you want to keep living on this rusty space dumpster, forever? With this Anton guy? Valentina looks into the shadowy dark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You didn't need to hurt him Gary. Gary's eyes glimmer in the darkness. Some tentacle too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come with me. We will return to Earth, to the dawn of man. There we will lay the foundations of a million-year dynasty, and rule an empire over all space and time. We will dominate the galaxy together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Together?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once I have the time cube, the universe is ours. Valentina, I came here for you. I did this all for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's so sweet. She decides to step into the darkness. A tentacle wraps around her as she disappears into the dark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 126 Tilda opens the medical kit, snaps on rubber gloves and straps on a surgical mask. Jimmy brings napkins. She goes monitor near the hallway. Tilda presses buttons on the screen. The monitor screen says "MEDICAL DATABASE DOWNLOA Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   7

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy, our orbit is still decaying. We have to stop our descent. You have to go to the control room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you going to be OK here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Jimmy puts down the napkins.

dialogues.speaker: 127A
dialogues.text: Jimmy moves fast but cautiously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 128 Tilda slices, stitches and sews fast. Blood splatters aga Tilda from Anton's mouth. She squints and keeps working. room shimmies and shakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 130 Valentina comes in straightening her clothing and hair. J is works under an open control panel, he turns and sees h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you go? Anton is hurt pretty bad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Attention crew of the Western Alliance Sanitation Station Regina.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 131 Tilda has finished her surgery and is taking off her bloo gloves. Anton is bandaged, unconscious. She looks up to h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prepare to be incinerated. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   75

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 132 Jimmy goes to the captain's central console.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's in the storage bay, going towards the crew quarters. Tilda and I managed to reroute the door controls. If I can just figure out... Jimmy hits buttons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ha. Sucker. Jimmy dramatically hits a big button on the keyboard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 133 A big light blinks green next to the open door. CU on the door frame as the door closes. LOCKING SOUND. A TENTACLE slaps angrily against the hatch window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 134 Jimmy works on the controls. Valentina comes up behind hi a sneaky way, he doesn't notice. She's holding a toolbox.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's locked in. That should buy us some time but we have to hurry. Help me figure out the thruster controls. Valentina creeps up right behind Jimmy. Jimmy turns to se her too late: she bashes Jimmy in the head with the tool and tosses it aside. Valentina uses the keyboard. Jimmy rolls over, regains fo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm leaving Jimmy. I'm done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you going? Tilda appears behind Valentina and hits her in the back o her head with the toolbox. Valentina goes down. Valentina rubs her head. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   76

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow. Tilda helps Jimmy up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks Tilda. Oh no, she let Gary loose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 135 A glimpse of Gary scampering out of the open hatch where was trapped before, leaving a slime trail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 136 Tilda finishes binding Valentina to a chair with tape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give Gary the time cube. You don't know him like I know him. He'll help us. He'll save us. Tilda is not convinced. Jimmy is on the soldering damaged circuits in a the control panel. He wears safety goggles. Time Cube sits on the floor behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's a monster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's just a phase. Jimmy closes the console he's working on. Presses buttons The room shifts to the left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're entering the upper atmosphere. Jimmy stands up. Jimmy wipes the sweat off his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's bad, isn't it? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   7

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have fifteen minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's too much damage to fix in fifteen minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe we should try to make a deal. A low RUMBLE sound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't allow Gary to have total control of time and space. Jimmy gets back down into the computer panel. Tilda kneel next to him, watching. Valentina looks at the Time Cube o the floor and wriggles in her duct tape bonds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 137 The station starts to hit the atmosphere and shake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 138 Jimmy and Tilda press buttons and flip switches on the consoles as they talk. The room shimmies and shakes more more. The RUMBLE sound increases. Jimmy turns one more switch. BLEEP BLORP: the computer screen flickers on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi is online.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're falling Wendi. Correct our orbital position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do not have full control of Station systems. There is a break in the control path to my logic core.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is anything working?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rebooting and Reinitialization will take approximately three hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have... fourteen minutes. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11    7

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave Wendi to me. Jimmy reaches into an open mess of cables in a compartmen and tosses Tilda an RS232 cable. She turns away from him, unzips her jumpsuit and plugs in her plug as before once Jimmy stops staring. Jimmy goes under the central console sneaks glances to figure out what exactly she's doing. Sh zips up again with the cable sticking out, and concentrat The monitors flash on. Jimmy spills out the tool box, gra tools and sticks his head back under the central console.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 139 The station starts to hit the hazy atmosphere and shakes more. Parts heat up. An antenna burns off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 140 The room shimmies and shakes. Valentina is straining agai her duct tape wrapping. It's loosening. They don't notice Jimmy is wriggling around in the confined area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're entering the mesosphere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's ugly in here. I don't know where the break is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Networking. Jimmy switches tools, moves around a flashlight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello Tilda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hi Wendi. The RUMBLE sound increases.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's it going?! Jimmy is jammed deep in the panel, where he uses a circui tester, probing. He wipes off his sweaty brow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try bank 5, on unit LBJ425. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   79 Jimmy shifts around, probes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here? Tilda is focused on the monitors, doesn't notice Valentin loose of her duct tape and stands up behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try the next circuit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 141 We can catch glimpses of Gary lurching past. He's bigger. Hulking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 142 Tilda sits, searching with her brain using her RS232 cabl patch into the computer. Abstract data scrolls fast down screens. It reflects in her eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Hurry. Valentina gently picks up the Time Cube and marvels at it a brief moment before backing out behind Tilda and out th door, stumbling on the bulkhead a little and running off. Jimmy reaches way deep into the panel and probes a circui

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're getting closer. The rooms shakes suddenly extra hard. A CREAK of strained metal. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   80

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 143 We can just make out Gary and his tentacles dragging hims around a corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 145 Jimmy reaches as far as humanly possible with his logic p and touches a difficult-to-reach circuit way in the back, a maze of jumbled blinking lights, cables and circuits:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's your problem. He pulls out a smoldering burned circuit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The midrange data processor is burned out. I think we need it to control the thrust vector.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't fix it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way. No... I don't have the parts. This is serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No we're not. The room shakes more. Tilda unplugs the RS232 cable from wall and grabs a cable cutter from Jimmy's belt. She pull down her jumpsuit shoulder exposing her back tattoo lines again. Jimmy watches in fascination. Tilda jabs herself and cuts a 6 inch hole in her abdomen. There's no blood. She reaches in and feels around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wish you would warn me if you're going to do something like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait... Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   8 Tilda grunts and grimaces - something rips and her hand c out with an organic/electric device with blinking lights. Wires and cables poke out of the hole in her stomach and with goo, she tucks them back in painfully with one hand holds herself closed as she hands the device to Jimmy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try using this. Jimmy takes it with a mixture of horror and curiosity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you need it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have two of them. Jimmy notices Valentina is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Val? Tilda turns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The time Cube!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on, let me plug this in. Jimmy ducks back under   the panel and stuffs the strange device into the socket   of the circuit board. Sparks fly lights start blinking!   The SOUND of the midrange data processor humming back   to life. Green lights on monitor Jimmy clamps alligator clips around a broken cable and scrambles up. The monitor screens show green blinking symbols. Tilda uses a staple gun to close her wound, show no sign of pain, tucks away her RS232 cable and zips up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It worked! Jimmy sees one monitor still shows ERROR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not working.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thruster control is on a different circuit. It's still offline. Tilda sinks into a chair. The effort has worn her down. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   82

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It should have worked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's another break in the control path.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be okay. But there's only one way to target the thrusters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Manually.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean outside?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes outside. The digital vector diagram monitor shows their orbit fall into the `danger zone' past the `Krmn line'. Jimmy se Tilda suffer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take this. Jimmy hands Tilda Anton's blaster - Jimmy found time to repair it with wires, duct tape, and junk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll need it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be ok. Jimmy gets up to go, summons his courage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy, in ten minutes the outer hull will burn away completely. Hurry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's go time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 146 Cables are loose, hanging, red siren lights. The walls rattle. Jimmy walks carefully, looking for Gary. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   83

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 148 Valentina steps out of the hall and stands near Anton. Sh holds the Time Cube.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's there? Valentina?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's over Anton. We're leaving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something is wrong with you Val. You can't trust someone that wants to eat you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gary loves me. He loves me in ways you couldn't understand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought we've had some good times. Anton notices Gary (duck 3) lurking in the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gary? I'll kick your ass. Anton struggles to sit up. He falls back down. Val puts d the time cube on the counter and helps Anton settle down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gary! I have the Time Cube! Gary stays in the shadows, nearby. We can see him quiver jiggle as he speaks, suggestions of a jaw moving, but lot amorphous tentacles and bulging monstrous shapes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before we go, one last thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kill him. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   84

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You pussy, come over here. Afraid to fight like a man? Valentina looks at Anton, looks at Gary, conflicted.

dialogues.speaker: 148A
dialogues.text: Blaring SIRENS, RED CHERRY LIGHTS. Jimmy comes around to door marked AIRLOCK MODULE. He very slowly peeks in, scar

dialogues.speaker: 148B
dialogues.text: Continued with Anton, Val and Gary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want to see you kill him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't need to do that Gary. We can just go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Killll himmmmm. Gary tosses the bent exercise machine handlebar to her fe She picks it up and looks at Anton. Anton manages to sit up, faces her without any aggression

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If this guy is going to make you happy, go ahead. I understand. Val sees Anton in a different light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's ok.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 150 Jimmy enters the dark trashed airlock module, looking aro Space suit parts are a mess on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn. Jimmy frantically sorts through space suit parts. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11    8

dialogues.speaker: 150A
dialogues.text: Tilda looks at a screen that counts down to 00:00:02:00.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm entering the airlock.

dialogues.speaker: 150B
dialogues.text: Jimmy in a helmet and space suit stands nervous at the ha He hesitates. The lights turn red. He presses the button.

dialogues.speaker: 150C
dialogues.text: Anton, Val and Gary continued. Valentina hefts the handle checks out Anton. He looks pitiful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't see why-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry up. Kill him now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me a second Gary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you give me a second Gary?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kill him! Valentina turns around defiantly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't like being bossed around. Anton nods in confirmation of this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 151 Jimmy [in spacesuit] moves along the exterior of the stat Atmosphere blows past him. The air is thin but they're mo fast. Smoke trails from burning station bits stream past. station shakes. Jimmy is terrified, holds on for dear lif He sneezes in his helmet. The glass is all splattered. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -    11/12/11   8

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gah! POV Jimmy: splatter and mucus on the inside of the glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 152 Tilda leans over the control panel, watching monitors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm outside the station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep going Jimmy, You have to align and fire the thruster in ninety seconds or we'll implode.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay no problem.

dialogues.speaker: 152A
dialogues.text: Gary comes out of the shadows ('duck 3'). He's a hulking monstrous thing. Valentina is not intimidated. Anton is a little intimidated, still weak from his injuries.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So this is how it's going to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yup. Valentina swings high at Gary and catches him upside the head. He snarls and bashes her with a tentacle, knocking the handlebar. She gives him a few punches, kick in the d nuts. Gary knocks her down by the sandwich machine. Anton grabs a chair. A tentacle comes at Anton - it pulls him o by his neck, he drops the chair, and is thrown down by th hatch. Gary side steps quickly, looking around. He sees the Time Cube on the counter and sends a tentacle at it. Valentina stabs the tentacle with a plastic fork and it p back, spraying green blood and mucous in an unexpectedly heavy geyser over Valentina, Anton and the room. Valentina throws the time cube over the table to Anton, w catches it. Gary refocusses on Val and moves toward her. He bashes he with a tentacle sending her over the table. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   87

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 153 Jimmy clambers along the rail that he's clipped into. He comes to the thruster. We hear his rapid breathing in the space suit. Behind him is the expanse of cold space. The station rotates until the Earth takes up the view behind Everything shakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Almost there. Tilda? Tilda?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 154 The chair at the console where Tilda sat is empty. The ro shakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 155 Jimmy reaches a cone-shaped thruster. He clips in an extr tether to a metal ring nearby and turns a handle, opening small access panel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How the hell does this work? Jimmy finds a small keypad and joystick in the panel. He buttons. Jimmy turns the joystick. The thruster next to him moves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. That's good.

dialogues.speaker: 155A
dialogues.text: The vector graphic shows HULL COLLAPSE IMMINENT DANGER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten seconds until hull collapse.

dialogues.speaker: 155B
dialogues.text: Gary looms up over the dazed Valentina. Anton is dazed. Gary is as scary as possible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   88 Gary and Val turn toward the hallway: Tilda's there. She throws the laser blaster to Valentina who catches it and at Gary. Gary freezes, afraid. Valentina takes great pleasure at pulling the trigger. ZZZZORCH! A beam blasts from the blaster at Gary, instant causing an immense SPLAT! Valentina opens her eyes to see it rain Gary bits. Anton comes over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that my blaster?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy fixed it. Anton helps Valentina up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks Tilda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is Jimmy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 157 Jimmy at the thruster, he grips the joystick, feeling woo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here goes nothing. He's sweating profusely. He looks at his glove - it's burning. There's orange-glowing cinders flying off his bo Jimmy hits the big red button! A BLAST OF PLASMA fires ou the thruster next to him. (Wide shot) Over the course of five long seconds, the sta stops falling. The thruster stops firing. He's burning more now. His suit POPS A LEAK! Smoke whizze out of a hole in his arm. He stares at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh crap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 158 Tilda runs in to see a screen that shows a vector graphic the station in the "red zone". It slowly starts to correc Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   88

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy? Come in Jimmy! You did it. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11    8 Valentina and Anton hobble in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He did it. The room stops shaking. The RUMBLE sound stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Orbit is stabilizing. Jimmy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 159 POV Jimmy: he's losing consciousness, looking at the pret sunset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy? Come in Jimmy. Jimmy?!

dialogues.speaker: 159A
dialogues.text: Anton and Val look worried. Tilda rips off her headphones walks out.

dialogues.speaker: 159B
dialogues.text: Tilda walks then speeds up into a run as Val and Anton si the background in the control room. [no window covers]

dialogues.speaker: 159C
dialogues.text: Tilda enters and opens the inner airlock door, revealing Jimmy taking off his scorched helmet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy! She hugs him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are we ok?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. You did it.

dialogues.speaker: 159D
dialogues.text: Anton and Val sit next to each other. Val tenderly wipes Gary goo off Anton's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks sweetie. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   89

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're twice the man Gary ever was.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. She hugs him. He wraps his manly arms around her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 160 The Station orbit is stable. It's a little burned but sti in one piece. Stars twinkle. The night is silent. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   90

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 166 Tilda and Jimmy are sitting, eating sandwiches. The room tidy now, cleaner than it's ever been. Food wrappers arou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could eat another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chicken?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ham. She pulls another sandwich from the shelf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ham.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice. The Time Cube is on the floor with cables running into it from all over. Tilda checks the cables.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we're ready. Jimmy hits the intercom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Control room, are you ready?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're activating it. Jimmy hits keys on a keyboard. All the computer screens t on. The strange HUMMING sound starts. The Time Cube GLOWS BLUE. The lights dim slightly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think it's working.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi; status report please. She eats her sandwich. Jimmy picks up his sandwich and ea it. They both stare at the computer, eating sandwiches. Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -   11/12/11   91

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wendi? What's going on? Is it working?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time Cube interface activated. The humming gets louder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe I should-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 167 The space station orbits around the earth, then POOF; the entire station is gone in a warping flash of light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 168 The flash fades away. Tilda and Jimmy stare at the comput screens. The blinking lights slow down. The HUMMING sound dies down. They rub their eyes. The intercom clicks on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jimmy? Jimmy snaps out of his daze and hits the intercom button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. We're okay. Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're fine up here. Jimmy sees a screen marked "COMM" blinking. He presses th button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sanitation station Regina come in. This is Ground control. We have a level two debris warning lit up here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 169 The station orbits a living earth, with sparkling cities glowing in the night below. Space stations and satellites orbit with the scorched station and junk ring, as before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ground control? Space Milkshake Prod. Draft Rev10b BLUE -     11/12/11

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Are you going to going to atomize the debris or do we have to call the spaceworkers union rep? A small metal screw floats in space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 170 Anton sits in shock with Valentina.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The... debris warning thing. Get the debris. Valentina flips a switch and grabs the joystick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 171 A laser beam fires out and atomizes the metal screw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good job Regina. The shuttle drone flies past where the screw was.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 172 Anton and Val hug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roger that Ground control. Nice to hear from you, anytime.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shove it Regina. Ground Control out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 173 Tilda and Jimmy walk into a medium shot, look out the win Tilda takes Jimmy's hand in front of the window with the Earth rotating outside, space full of lights and shuttles THE END.
